building.blazers-town.blazers.blacksmith: The Blacksmith can provide Ballistas to your army.
building.blazers-town.blazers.capitol.de: The Capitol provides you with 4000 Gold per day.
building.blazers-town.blazers.castle.des: The Castle provides 2 additional arrow towers to strengthen the town's defense and doubles the base growth rate of creatures.
building.blazers-town.blazers.citadel.de: The Citadel not only increases base creature growth by 50%, but also strengthens the town's defensive structures.
building.blazers-town.blazers.cityHall.d: The City Hall allows you to build town structures and provides 2000 Gold per day.
building.blazers-town.blazers.dwellingLv: The Cottages allow you to recruit Leopardmen.
The Beholder Lair allows you to recruit Winged Beholders.
The Altar of Light allows you to recruit Light Elements.
The Magic Pavilion allows you to recruit Maya Mages.
The Martial Arts Hall allows you to recruit Magic Blade Fanatics.
The Colosseum allows you to recruit Radiant Warriors.
The Temple of Light Wings allows you to recruit Light-Winged Soldiers.
The Guardian Temple allows you to recruit Temple Guards.
building.blazers-town.blazers.dwellingUp: The Upgraded Cottages allow you to recruit Elite Leopardmen.
The Upgraded Beholder Lair allows you to recruit Floating Beholders.
The Upgraded Altar of Light allows you to recruit Holy Radiance Elements.
The Upgraded Magic Pavilion allows you to recruit Maya Archmages.
The Upgraded Martial Arts Hall allows you to recruit Magic Blade Masters.
The Upgraded Colosseum allows you to recruit Solar Battle Kings.
The Upgraded Temple of Light Wings allows you to recruit Light-Winged Captains.
The Upgraded Guardian Temple allows you to recruit Temple Holy Guards.
building.blazers-town.blazers.fort.descr: The Fort provides walls for your town.
building.blazers-town.blazers.fort.name: Fort
building.blazers-town.blazers.grail.desc: The Projection of the Temple of Light increases weekly creature growth by 50%, provides an additional 5000 Gold per day to your kingdom, and makes all allied creatures immune to harmful and cursing Air Magic.
building.blazers-town.blazers.grail.name: Projection of the Temple of Light
building.blazers-town.blazers.horde1.des: The Construction Office increases Leopardmen growth by +7 per week.
The Construction Office increases Elite Leopardmen growth by +7 per week.
building.blazers-town.blazers.mageGuild1: Visiting heroes can learn spells from the Mage Guild.
building.blazers-town.blazers.mageGuild2: Visiting heroes can learn spells from the Mage Guild.
building.blazers-town.blazers.mageGuild3: Visiting heroes can learn spells from the Mage Guild.
building.blazers-town.blazers.mageGuild4: Visiting heroes can learn spells from the Mage Guild.
building.blazers-town.blazers.mageGuild5: Visiting heroes can learn spells from the Mage Guild.
building.blazers-town.blazers.marketplac: The Marketplace allows you to trade resources (the more markets you own, the cheaper the prices).
building.blazers-town.blazers.resourceSi: The Resource Silo provides you with 1 extra Gem per day.
building.blazers-town.blazers.special1.d: The Lookout Tower expands the visible range around the town.
building.blazers-town.blazers.special2.d: The Karez permanently increases the daily mana regeneration of visiting heroes by 2 points.
building.blazers-town.blazers.special2.r: The Karez permanently increases the daily mana regeneration of visiting heroes by 2 points.
building.blazers-town.blazers.special3.d: The Valley of Spirits increases the Attack of every visiting hero by +1.
building.blazers-town.blazers.tavern.des: The Tavern increases the morale of the garrison.
building.blazers-town.blazers.townHall.d: The Town Hall allows you to build town structures and provides 1000 Gold per day.
building.blazers-town.blazers.villageHal: The Village Hall allows you to build town structures and provides 500 Gold per day.
creatures.blazers-town.blv5up.descriptio:
{Skill Description}: 
{Rage}: Increases Attack and Defense by +2 every turn, stacking over turns.
creatures.blazers-town.blv7.description:
{Skill Description}: 
Light-Winged Soldiers have at least +2 Morale and Luck.
creatures.blazers-town.blv7b.description:
{Skill Description}: 
{Light God's Protection}: Used on a single allied unit, can stack with Light God's Blessing.
creatures.blazers-town.blv7up.descriptio:
{Skill Description}: 
Light-Winged Captains have at least +3 Morale and Luck.
creatures.blazers-town.blv7upb.descripti:
{Skill Description}: 
{Light God's Protection}: Used on a single allied unit, can stack with Light God's Blessing.
faction.blazers-town.blazers.name: Blazers

hero.blazers-town.blaBethan.specialty.de: Faction creatures gain the Charge skill.

hero.blazers-town.blaDanlal.specialty.de: Faction creatures deal extra damage to certain units of the Factory faction.

hero.blazers-town.blaSenas.specialty.des: All creatures led by the hero gain +2 Attack, +2 Defense, and +1 Speed; the Attack and Defense values are added directly to the hero's stats.

hero.blazers-town.blaStephanie.specialty: Receives a 4% extra bonus for each level in First Aid, and First Aid Tent HP is increased by 225.

spell.blazers-town.blazersSpell1.descrip:
{Light God's Blessing}

Simultaneously increases all units' Health by 15%+1, Damage by 15%+1, and Speed by 2.

spell.blazers-town.blazersSpell2.descrip:

spell.blazers-town.blazersSpell3.name: Light God's Judgment
